description: This file implements various message sending functions over TCP sockets for the Ansc Lpcco Tcp Object, specifically for HELLO, ACK, REQUEST, REPLY, and BYE message types, utilizing the IMCP protocol.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpSendHello(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket)
methods.description: Sends a HELLO message over the specified socket, constructing the message with party information and using the send method of the socket object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpSendAck(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket)
methods.description: Sends an ACK message over the specified socket, including reserved and party name fields.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpSendRequest(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,void * buffer,ULONG ulSize,ULONG ulSeqNumber,ULONG ulReqType)
methods.description: Sends a REQUEST message with raw data buffer, sequence number, and request type over the socket.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpSendReply(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,void * buffer,ULONG ulSize,ULONG ulSeqNumber,ULONG ulReqType,ULONG ulRepCode)
methods.description: Sends a REPLY message with raw data, sequence number, request type, and reply code over the socket.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoTcpSendBye(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket)
methods.description: Sends a BYE message with party information over the specified socket.

ctags.name: AnscLpccoTcpSendReply
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,void * buffer,ULONG ulSize,ULONG ulSeqNumber,ULONG ulReqType,ULONG ulRepCode)

ctags.name: AnscLpccoTcpSendRequest
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,void * buffer,ULONG ulSize,ULONG ulSeqNumber,ULONG ulReqType)
